keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map j scrollUp
map k scrollDown
map J scrollPageUp
map K scrollPageDown
map <Space>j previousTab
map <Space>k nextTab
map w removeTab
map R restoreTab
map W moveTabToNewWindow
map i focusInput
map <Space>t togglePinTab
map at firstTab
map et lastTab
map <Space>h moveTabLeft
map <Space>l moveTabRight
map eh scrollToLeft
map el scrollToRight
map d LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
